name: Billy went fishing
description:
Billy is bored and start fishing so that he can make some money.

oh aned i tried html5 export but it broke a lot of stuff somehow.

How to play

Arrow keys to move

Press E to start fishing. Hold E when the fishing rod got pulled down to catch the fish 

Tab to toggle the selling menu

Ctrl to toggle the upgrading menu

* Credits *

In-game music by @RHYTHMMASTER

Made with GameMaker Studio 1.4(legacy gms because yes)

Made for lame jam 16
